explanations.machine learning: The paper explicitly mentions the development of a machine learning-based prediction model for postoperative pulmonary complications.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves training models on labeled data to predict outcomes, which is characteristic of supervised learning.
explanations.classification: The model predicts whether patients will develop postoperative pulmonary complications, which is a classification task.
explanations.regression: Logistic regression, a type of regression model, was used and identified as the best-performing model in the study.
explanations.feature learning: Feature selection was performed using the LASSO method, indicating an emphasis on identifying relevant features for the model.
explanations.logistic regression: The paper specifically mentions that logistic regression demonstrated the best performance among the models developed.
